items.content_html: Mini Mealie is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance the experience of Mealie, an open-source recipe manager. With Mini Mealie, users can quickly import recipes from any website into their Mealie instance with a simple right-click.

items.content_html: Sololom is a lightweight, standalone LLM (Large Language Model) service designed for seamless local deployment and easy integration. It provides a simple API for interacting with language models without relying on cloud-based solutions.

items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
